description.narrative: RA 2.2: Aligned programming: LAC programming is planned, conducted, monitored and evaluated effectively and efficiently, in line with the corporate strategic plans and guidelines, supporting UN Coherence and global priorities, which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Economic And Social Policy General, Gender Discriminatory Roles And Practices, Human Rights Institutions, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment, Public Finance And Local Governance, Social Exclusion â€“ Data And Evidence, Social Protection, Social Protection And Child Poverty, Unicef Capacity For Programming On Gender. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 001 Global and Regional Programme: Enhanced regional capacity related to evidence-based analysis, tools and advocacy and multi- country initiatives contributing to achieve the Strategic Plan targets with equity focus in the LAC region

sector.narrative: Behavioural change communication campaigns on gender equitable roles and practices

Cash Transfers: Technical support to government cash transfer system development and expansion (design, targeting, beneficiary selection, grievance mechanism, cash delivery mechanisms like banking, mobiles, community distribution)
Child marriage - surveys (e.g. KAP, VACS), data analysis/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use
Child poverty analysis towards policy change (Profiling, mapping and identifying drivers of multi-dimensional and monetary poverty of children, modelling and simulation of policy options)
Child poverty measurement: support to routine national measurement of monetary and multidimensional child poverty
Delivery of cash transfers or voucher through new and/or parallel system (humanitarian context)
ECD data, evidence, and knowledge generation and dissemination
PF4C - domestic revenue mobilization and access to finance for key social services
PF4C: Improving public expenditure effectiveness / efficiency
Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration
Technical assistance - Gender discriminatory roles and practices

description.narrative: In 2017, LACRO achievements include: publication of the State of the Art on child poverty measurement, development of study on social protection supporting families with children affected by Zika and other disabilities; and development of a series of indicators to effectively measure public investment for children. | Status:Met | As-of Date:18/12/2017
